CustomField.formula: CASE( StageName , "Verify Formation Details",3, "Request Correction", 3, "File LLC", 7, "Email LLC Docs", 5, "Upload Operating Agreement", 4, "File EIN", 3, "Upload EIN Confirmation", 3, "Confirm Initial Contribution", 10, "Follow Up" , 10, "Confirm Payment" , 10, "Verify entity information", 4, "Request corrected info", 5, "QBO / Gusto / Email", 7, "Confirm BK Call Scheduled", 5, "Take BK Training Call", 20, "Send Tax Onboarding Email", 7, "Confirm Tax Call Scheduled", 5, "Take Tax Kick off Call", 20, 10 )
CustomField.label: Allowable Duration
